name: Tea Society of a Witch
description: The world used to have be shared by humans and magic-users. War broke raged for ages, until the magic users finally escaped to a land of their own; for centuries afterwards, they would live apart. Having finally established peace, the two societies try to reintegrate by encouraging contact between each other. To do that, three witches are sent to the human world to attend high school as exchange students. The player controls a normal human teenage boy who gets to know all three of the witches. This visual novel features a branching story depending on the player's choices.
